title: I can't find and delete the pictures on my Google Pixel 3
content: Hi Everyone, Please help to resolve  the problem on my pixel 3 smartphone. I tried to clean the storage memory of the my device and seen most space take the photo and video. I tried to clean the photo and video and clicked to the string photo and video in the Storage menu item. Next I seen three strings - Google photo, Camera and Pictures and  the most space take the Pictures. My problem is I realyy don't have this Pictures on my devise, and I can't find it to delete. I tried using for this the file manager, I connected my smartphone to my PC and can't find this pictures in this way too. Can somebody help me to resolve this problem. I'll be really appreciate
